yunhei.help.desc:
Cloud Blacklist feature (under construction).
Please visit https://yunhei.youshou.wiki for more information.
yunhei.help.check: Check a single blacklist member or scan members in the group
yunhei.help.listadmin: View Cloud Blacklist administrator contact list
yunhei.message.needbotadmin: Error: This feature requires the bot to be a group admin. Please contact the group owner to set it.
yunhei.message.invalidnum: Sorry, the number you entered is incorrect.
